nodes.bodyText: This var name should be changed as well. It should become TASK_CHECKSLAYERGEM_KONAR_2 and move next to that line earlier in the file.
Is this meant to throw IOException?

This is to be consistent with https://github.com/runelite/runelite/pull/11128/files#diff-e1297a0ae6bdf66b5be1b855ea54e07bR765 since they are testing the same code.
I can reorder the tests to make this a bit more clear.
Why is this validating that the chat message manager is making changes here? This is not testing the right behavior. Instead, this should be similar to testCheckSlayerGemKonarTask().

I intended for this test to be similar to testTaskLookup in that it tests taskLookup does what's expected (update the chat message if we have a whitelisted task location). In this case I'm doing slightly more end-to-end testing by starting the test from the the NPC dialog, but I can remove the earlier "setup" code if we want to contain the test to just that one method.
@Nightfirecat would this be an acceptable test given my earlier comment?
That test is specififally verifying lookup. This one does not need to.
I'm happy to remove these tests altogether then; I'm simply adding an entry to the locations whitelist which is used in taskLookup
That seems like a good solution. We've got pretty sufficient tests for this code path in the plugin and just need to add the new location. 👍
